name: workbench
description: Desktop app for task running with AI models and plugin tools
author: YakStacks

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run build:electron && electron . --dev"
scripts.build:electron: tsc main.ts preload.ts doctor.ts permissions.ts run-manager.ts process-registry.ts secrets-manager.ts tool-manifest.ts dry-run.ts memory-manager.ts tool-dispatch.ts environment-detection.ts --outDir . --esModuleInterop --module commonjs --strict --skipLibCheck && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.renameSync('main.js','main.cjs');fs.renameSync('preload.js','preload.cjs');fs.renameSync('doctor.js','doctor.cjs');fs.renameSync('permissions.js','permissions.cjs');fs.renameSync('run-manager.js','run-manager.cjs');fs.renameSync('process-registry.js','process-registry.cjs');fs.renameSync('secrets-manager.js','secrets-manager.cjs');fs.renameSync('tool-manifest.js','tool-manifest.cjs');fs.renameSync('dry-run.js','dry-run.cjs');fs.renameSync('memory-manager.js','memory-manager.cjs');fs.renameSync('tool-dispatch.js','tool-dispatch.cjs');fs.renameSync('environment-detection.js','environment-detection.cjs')" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');let c=fs.readFileSync('main.cjs','utf8');c=c.replace('require(\"./doctor\")', 'require(\"./doctor.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./permissions\")', 'require(\"./permissions.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./run-manager\")', 'require(\"./run-manager.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./process-registry\")', 'require(\"./process-registry.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./secrets-manager\")', 'require(\"./secrets-manager.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./tool-manifest\")', 'require(\"./tool-manifest.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./dry-run\")', 'require(\"./dry-run.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./memory-manager\")', 'require(\"./memory-manager.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./tool-dispatch\")', 'require(\"./tool-dispatch.cjs\")');c=c.replace('require(\"./environment-detection\")', 'require(\"./environment-detection.cjs\")');fs.writeFileSync('main.cjs',c)"
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 && node set-icon.cjs && electron-builder build --win nsis --x64 --prepackaged release/win-unpacked
